name: (Orange) Chocolate Tart
description: Dark or milk chocolate ganache filling, flavored with rum and a bit of orange extract. Topped with a cocoa glaze and edible gold. (For future orders, maybe orange zest!) *Orange flavoring is optional, if you prefer just a plain chocolate tart

name: Peachy-Apple Custard
description: Sugar-syrup'd applie slices on top of a peach-oolong jam, and custard filling.

name: Red N' Berries
description: An all-red, berry tart (strawberries, raspberries, cherries) w/ a chocolate crust.

name: Sweet Potato Montblanc
description: A montblanc tart, but with japanese sweet potato puree instead of chestnut!
